original_title: Rotting Christ: Streaming For European Metal Festival Alliance
overview: This video shooted and  recorded on the 6th of July 2020  at Artworks Studios for the needs of European Metal Festival Alliance live streaming.  Mixed & Mastered by Callmelazy (aka Costas Gavakos)  at Soundflakes Studio  Directed by:Yiannis Margetousakis-Thanos Liberopoulos  Edited by: Yiannis Margetousakis-Thanos Liberopoulos-Manolis Rizikos  Cameras: Thanos Liberopoulos- Yiannis Margetousakis-Panos Iliopoulos  All music & Lyrics by Sakis Tolis  Setlist  01 -  Χ Ξ Σ  02 - Κατά Tον δαίμονα Tου Eαυτού  03 - Fire God And Fear  04 - Ἐλθὲ Κύριε  05 - Ἄπαγε Σατανά  06 - Dies Irae  07 - In Yumen Xibalba  08 - Grandis Spiritus Diavolos  09 - Threnody
title: Rotting Christ: Streaming For European Metal Festival Alliance
